Header: Breaking : Former Additional Magistrate surrenders to court
Content: Former Additional Magistrate Thilina Gamage who was wanted in connection over the alleged possession of an elephant calf without a permit surrendered to court today ( June 2nd) According to the Criminal Investigations Department, Thilina Gamage, surrendered to the Nugegoda Magistrates Court. A warrant was issued yesterday (June 1st) by Nugegoda Chief Magistrate and Additional District Judge Kanishka Wijeratne to arrest Thilina Gamage in connection with the possession of an elephant calf without a permit.
